publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4070 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Civil Legal Aid (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft Civil Legal Aid (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry*
